sentence: If I hadn't sprained my ankle, I wouldn't even spare him a glance. Sorry, I don't entertain non-work matters. 傅杭冷漠的声音从风中飘来，听着了无生趣，无比惆怅。 Fu Hang's cold voice drifted through the wind, sounding lifeless and deeply melancholy.
source: This sentence is likely from a Chinese novel or drama, possibly describing a scene where a character named Fu Hang speaks in a cold and detached manner, but the exact source is unknown.

sentence: The app's download numbers are off the charts this week.今天就到这里，分分钟数据报表就可以结算，直接下岗失业。 That's all for today. You can generate data reports in minutes. You'll be out of a job. 财务是一个非常讲究人的职业，想长久地做财务工作，一定要有深刻的职业认知，要维持自己的职业形象，这就是那个富豪刚聘用的保安，望着富豪离去的背影，小声地说道。 Finance is a profession that values interpersonal skills. If you want to stay in this field long-term, you need to have a deep understanding of it. You also need to maintain a professional image. This is the security guard that the rich man just hired. Looking at the rich man's back as he left, he whispered to his colleague. 你知道你为什么没有被调到一楼吗？ Do you know why you weren't transferred to the first floor? 那名保安目不斜视，抿着嘴小声回答。 The security guard stared straight ahead and answered in a low voice without turning his head. 为什么？ Why? 因为你小子没眼力见。 Because you lack professional insight.
source: This sentence appears to be a mix of English and Chinese fragments, possibly from a bilingual business or workplace scenario, though the exact source is unclear from the provided context.

sentence: That guy just now looked shifty-eyed and sneaky. If Duan An hadn't caught him secretly, he would have rushed up just now. 所以认认真真要找那位的也行，他一个月回来两次，初一十五，同批了的。 So if you really want to find that person, he comes back twice a month, on the first and fifteenth day of the lunar month, like us. 认真叮嘱，这有钱人的嗜好还真是奇怪。 He seriously warned that the rich people's hobbies are really strange. 莫不是大名？ Could it be Daming? 保安下意识地摇头，看向位于三十六的云一号。 The security guard shook his head subconsciously, looking at Yunyi No.1 on the 36th floor. 不知道小刘为什么会被调过来。 I don't know why Xiao Liu was transferred here. 保安没理解这话的意思。 The security guard didn't understand what he meant.
source: This is a line from a Chinese novel or TV drama, possibly featuring a scene involving security guards and wealthy individuals in a high-rise building.

sentence: 产业的能稳定年一亿。 The industry can generate a stable annual revenue of 100 million yuan. 不定的还有小起大笔。 There are also occasional large sums. 别闹，安心当舔狗好。 Stop joking. Just be a good sycophant. 每天固定打上班，其余时间真自由，财富自由。 Go to work at a fixed time every day, and enjoy true freedom and financial freedom for the rest of the time. 耗子，无非十几年婚生，这年头因为工作耽误事的还少吗？ Haozi, it's just a matter of getting married and having kids in a dozen years, aren't there enough examples of people delaying important matters due to work these days? 有事业心、有上进心、有理想、有抱负的新时代青年，是不是？ Ambitious, motivated, idealistic, and aspiring young people in the new era aren't they?
source: This appears to be a mix of business and motivational content, possibly from a Chinese social media post or a self-improvement video, but the exact source is not identifiable without more context.

sentence: 还急？等我们到你学校，你怕都没的办法。 Still in a hurry? By the time we get to your school, you'll be helpless. 另一名混混也开口。 Another hoodlum chimed in. 不，你们不能去学校，女孩猛的抬头，眼底惊恐更深。 No, you can't go to school. The girl looked up sharply, her eyes filled with even more fear. 是我告诉你们，要不是学生的身份能提高价格。 I told you, if it weren't for the students' identities, the price could be higher. 我们早去你学校。 We would have gone to your school already. 光头仰着头，一口浓烟，吐在了女孩的脸上， The bald guy puffed out a cloud of smoke, and blew the smoke in the girl's face.
source: This is likely from a Chinese novel or drama depicting a bullying scenario involving students and local hoodlums.

sentence: Are you looking for death? 另外一混混见了，立马转身靠了上来。 Another gangster immediately turned around and approached. 傅放一脸无辜，在人群外站着，目光依旧死死地盯着那个逼他到墙角的人。 Fu Fang looked innocent, standing outside the crowd, his eyes still fixed on the person who had cornered him. 对已经靠上来的混混浑然不知。 He was oblivious to the gangster who had already approached him. 洗到发白的衬衣，一个是某高中的运动裤，头发因为没洗变得非常散乱，厚厚的刘海盖住了整张脸，厚重的黑框眼镜更是遮盖住了双眼，但是一副职业舔狗的即视感。 He wore a faded shirt and sports pants from a high school, and his hair was unkempt due to not washing it, with thick bangs covering his entire face, and thick black-rimmed glasses hiding his eyes. He gave off the vibe of a professional simp.
source: This appears to be a line from a Chinese novel or web novel, possibly depicting a scene involving gangsters and a character named Fu Fang. The exact source is not identifiable as it does not reference a known published work or media.

sentence: 对已经靠上来的混混浑然不知。 He was completely unaware of the gangster who had already approached him. 洗到发白的衬衣，一看就是某高中校服的运动裤，头发因为推搡显得非常散乱，错落的刘海盖住了半张脸，厚厚的黑框眼镜更是遮盖住了双眼。 His faded shirt and high school sports pants looked messy because of pushing, and his bangs covered half of his face. His thick black-rimmed glasses covered his eyes even more. 但是以富航职业舔狗的嗅觉，以及系统挑剔的审美所培养的职业敏锐感，他有八成把握这姑娘有成为客户的潜质。 But with Fuhang's professional "lapdog" sense, and the professional acuity cultivated by the system's picky aesthetics, he is 80% sure that this girl has the potential to become a client. 我说你小子聋了啊？ Are you deaf? 让你滚！ Get lost! 被无视的混混怒气值开始暴涨，微微晃动的拳头预示着他的技能前摇，系统，系统，富航扫了眼那个准备技能读条的混混， The gangster who was ignored began to feel angry, and his slightly shaking fist indicated that his skill was about to be released. Fuhang glanced at the gangster who was preparing to release the skill, and
source: This appears to be an excerpt from a Chinese web novel or light novel, possibly involving themes of modern-day school life mixed with elements of gaming/system interfaces.

sentence: What's more, it's for business expansion. 你他妈还不滚？ Why the fuck don't you get out of here? 几个混混都围了上来，刚才付航后退的那一步极大增长了他们的气焰，能再等等吗？ Several gangsters surrounded him. The step that Fu Hang took back just now greatly boosted their arrogance. Can you wait a little longer? 系统一时间没回复，付航温和的开口：第三章…… The system didn't reply for a while, and Fu Hang opened his mouth gently
source: This is a line from a novel or a story involving a confrontation between a character named Fu Hang and some gangsters.

sentence: 我看你真是活腻歪了。 I think you really are tired of living. 最开始的混混完成了技能读条，抡圆了胳膊就要扑上来。 The first gangster finished the skill cooldown, and was about to pounce with his arm swung round. 富航急忙开口，身体又后退了一步。 Fuhang hurriedly opened his mouth, and took a step back. 怎么，现在知道怕了？ What, are you scared now? 不是，我的意思是，别和我动手，我，很能打。 No, what I mean is, don't fight me. I'm really good at fighting. 伤着你们就不好了。 It would be bad if I hurt you. 富航又嘬了口豆浆，另一只手掏出手机，认真的看着上面的日历。 Fuhang took another sip of soy milk, and took out his phone with the other hand, looking at the calendar on it seriously.
source: This seems to be a line from a Chinese web novel or light novel, possibly involving martial arts or urban contemporary themes, though the exact source cannot be determined without more context.

I'm really good at fighting. 伤着你们就不好了。 It would be bad if I hurt you. 富航又嘬了口豆浆，另一只手掏出手机，认真的看着上面的日历。 Fuhang took another sip of soy milk, and took out his phone with the other hand, looking at the calendar on it seriously.

sentence: T妈的，干他！ Damn it, let's do it! 被打断技能的混混彻底暴怒，直接释放了一个瞬发技能，抬起腿就向付航的肚子踹去。 The gangster whose skill was interrupted was completely enraged, and directly released an instant cast skill, then kicked towards Fu Hang's stomach. 然而他抬起的右腿膝盖还没伸直，忽然感觉身体一轻，一股失重感袭来，紧接着就是天旋地转，世界开始翻滚。 However, before his right leg could be fully extended, he suddenly felt his body become light, and a sense of weightlessness hit him, followed by a spinning sensation, and the world began to roll. 噗一声闷响，那名混混以一个奇怪的姿势贴在墙上。 With a muffled sound, the gangster was stuck on the wall in a strange position. 吧嗒一声落到地上。 With a thud, he fell to the ground. 你们看，我提醒过你们的。 You see, I warned you. 付航放下手机，又嘬了一口豆浆。 Fu Hang put down his phone, and took another sip of soy milk.
source: This is a line from a Chinese martial arts or action novel or web novel, possibly describing a fight scene involving Fu Hang.
This could be a line from a weather report, a descriptive passage in a novel, or a scene in a movie depicting a storm, but the exact source is unknown.

sentence: 拜拜。 Bye. 几个混混面面相觑，脸上写满诧异。 The gangsters looked at each other, astonished. 这人就这样飞起来了，他们甚至都没看清楚富航是怎么出手的。 The man flew up. They didn't even see how Fu Hang made his move. 不对，他一手豆浆，一手手机，干他！光头显然不是一般混混，岂能被这点场面吓到。 Wait, he had a cup of soybean milk in one hand and a cell phone in the other. Beat him! The bald guy was clearly no ordinary gangster. How could he be intimidated by such a scene? 怒喝一声就冲了上去。 With a fierce shout, he charged forward. 你很能打，还能一打五，然后他往前冲的脚步只走了五步，堪堪冲到富航面前，就停了下来。 You're good, even able to fight five of us. But after just five steps forward, he reached Fu Hang, and stopped.
source: This is likely a line from a Chinese martial arts or action novel or web novel, possibly from 'Lord of the Mysteries' or a similar genre, though the exact source is unclear without more context.

sentence: fierce shout and the scout fell down
source: This is likely from a children's story or a scouting-related narrative, though the exact source is uncertain.

sentence: 容貌出众，家境贫寒，孤苦无依，被高利贷追债。 She was pretty but poor. She had no one to rely on. She was being chased for debts by loan sharks. 这是苦情女主的模板吧。 She was like a tragic heroine. 这能舔吗？ Should he pursue her? 我，我母亲重病要动手术，我。女孩泪眼婆娑，双臂死死地环在身前。 My mother was seriously ill and needed an operation, the girl said, with tears streaming down her face and her arms tightly crossed over her chest. 呃，行了，我知道了。 Alright, I got it. 那个，她欠你们多少？ How much does she owe you? 付航心中警铃大作，重病的母亲，好赌的爹，这背景很危险。 Fu Hang's alarm bells were ringing. A seriously ill mother, a gambling father, this background was very dangerous.
source: This seems to be a dialogue from a Chinese drama or novel, possibly a romantic or melodramatic scene involving a female protagonist with a tragic background, but the exact source cannot be determined without more context.
